snippet: Carlos Boozer scored 27 points and Chicago outrebounded Miami, 48-28, to drop the Heat to 15-3 at home this season.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Chicago Bulls defeat Miami Heat, 96-89; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Carlos Boozer scored 27 points and Chicago outrebounded Miami, 48-28, to drop the Heat to 15-3 at home this season.

headline.seo: Bulls Dominate Boards to Send Heat to Only Third Loss at Home
headline.main: Bulls Hand Heat Rare Home Loss
headline.print_headline: Bulls Hand Heat Rare Home Loss
